quotes: In 2007 she was appointed by the UN Secretary General to serve as a Special Envoy on Climate Change along with Han Seung-soo, former foreign minister of South Korea, and Ricardo Lagos, former president of Chile.
Much of Gro Harlem Brundtland’s life has been chronicled in two books written by her husband, political scientist Arne Olav Brundtland, i.e., Married to Gro (1996), and Still Married to Gro (2003).
Much of Gro Harlem Brundtland’s life has been chronicled in two books written by her husband, political scientist Arne Olav Brundtland, i.e., Married to Gro (1996), and Still Married to Gro (2003).
Her autobiography, Madame Prime Minister (2002), deals compellingly with many aspects of her political engagement and public service.
She was married to Arne Olav Brundtland in 1960 and they had four children, three sons
On 22 July 2011 he detonated a bomb at a government building in Oslo, then drove to the island of Utøya to massacre dozens of young people at the Youth League Summer Camp.

organizations.name: UN
quotes: In 2007 she was appointed by the UN Secretary General to serve as a Special Envoy on Climate Change along with Han Seung-soo, former foreign minister of South Korea, and Ricardo Lagos, former president of Chile.

organizations.name: The Elders
quotes: The same year, Nelson Mandela convened a meeting of world leaders to constitute The Elders, a group of independent world leaders who “work together for peace, justice, and human rights.”

organizations.name: Council of Women World Leaders
quotes: Brundtland is also a member of the Council of Women World Leaders, a group that concerns itself with female health, sexual violence, and other issues related to women’s well-being.

organizations.name: Club of Madrid
quotes: As a member of the Club of Madrid, she is involved in efforts to promote and build democratic institutions around the world.

organizations.name: Labour Party
quotes: Anders Behring Breivik, a Norwegian nationalist, deplored the influx of immigrants into Norway and blamed the Labour Party and particularly the past leader of the Labour Party, Gro Harlem Brundtland, for Norway’s changing ethnic complexion.

roles.title: Deputy Chair
